messages.message: when I update an App, I want to run files from a previous job in the updated app, is this possible?

currently no, you’ll have to start a new job and upload the same files

it’s a good idea though! i can definitely see how a “retry” button would be useful in this case
@Natasha we currently show tooltips for jobs that used an older version of the app, but we only show the “Retry” button for failed/cancelled jobs
we should add the retry button on any outdated run regardless of whether it completed or failed
i think i had that in the design but lemme check again :sweat_smile:
okay, yeah there's different versions of this table between the main file and the post launch file, we should add that button tho! makes sense to me
would it be confusing to always show the “Retry” button, even if the job was successful?
i initially thought the warning icon would offer enough clarity but they're pretty far apart in this table..hmm..
would it be more or less confusing to say "Rerun" instead of retry and use this icon for out of date jobs...

ah yes, “Rerun” would definitely be a better label here!

i think the current icon is fine, i don’t think we need to change the icon based on the status :sweat_smile:

“Rerun” would fit with all cases, i believe

i think “Retry” implies that something previously went wrong
